text.name: sys_description
text.text: The MSX Turbo R is the last generation of MSX put on the market in 1990 to compensate for the cancellation of the MSX3. Only Panasonic has marketed its FS-A1ST and FS-A1GT models in Japan. With a 16-bit RISC processor and upgraded R800 CPU, it is the fastest of the entire MSX series.
